code: import*as React from'react';import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";import{withInternalTheme}from"../../core/theming";import RadioButtonAndroid from"./RadioButtonAndroid";import RadioButtonIOS from"./RadioButtonIOS";var RadioButton=function RadioButton(props){var Button=Platform.select({default:RadioButtonAndroid,ios:RadioButtonIOS});return React.createElement(Button,props);};export default withInternalTheme(RadioButton);
